Column.Name: Name
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( [Temp - Status] = "Active", $thisValue = NULL() ), "Questionnaire name required" )

Column.Name: Questions in Category
Column.Formula: ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Standard Question", "[Question Category] =" & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Question Category]) & " AND [LineNumber] = 1 AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) ) ))

Column.Name: Axis Max Score
Column.Formula: ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "SUM([Max Score])", "Standard Question", "[Axis Name] =" & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Axis Name]) & " AND [LineNumber] = 1 AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) ) ))

Column.Name: Number of Questions
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( [Temp - Status] = "Active", $thisValue <= 0 ), "At least one question required" )
Column.Formula: ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Standard Question", "[LineNumber] = 1 AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) ) ))

Column.Name: Category Max Score
Column.Formula: ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "SUM([Max Score])", "Standard Question", "[Question Category] =" & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Question Category]) & " AND [LineNumber] = 1 AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) ) ))

Column.Name: Invite Recipients String
Count of Not Started
Column.Formula:
LET $data := ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Questionnaire", "[Invited] = TRUE AND [Status] = 'Not Started' AND [LineNumber] = 1 AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = " & [RecordID] )));
RETURN IFERROR($data, NULL())

Column.Name: Count of In Progress
Column.Formula:
LET $data := ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Questionnaire", "[Invited] = TRUE AND [Status] = 'In Progress' AND [LineNumber] = 1 AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = " & [RecordID] )));
RETURN IFERROR($data, NULL())

Column.Name: Count Total
Column.Formula:
LET $data := ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Questionnaire", "[Invited] = TRUE AND [LineNumber] = 1 AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = " & [RecordID] )));
RETURN IFERROR($data, NULL())

Column.Name: Count of Completed
Column.Formula:
LET $data := ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Questionnaire", "[Invited] = TRUE AND [Status] = 'Complete' AND [LineNumber] = 1 AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = " & [RecordID] )));
RETURN IFERROR($data, NULL())

Column.Name: Number of Detected Email Addresses to Existing Accounts
Column.Formula: ARRAY_LENGTH([Detected Email Addresses to Existing Accounts])

Column.Name: Number of Detected Email Addresses to New Accounts
Column.Formula: ARRAY_LENGTH([Detected Email Addresses to New Accounts])

Column.Name: Detected Email Addresses to Existing Accounts
Detected Email Addresses to New Accounts
Number of Invites
System Users
Recipient Email Addresses
Parent Structure
This View
Navigation Options

Label.Text: What kind of questionnaire is this

Information.Text:
- Feedback/Surveys are unscored. There will be no scores attributed to the questionnaire.
- Assessment/Quizzes are scored. Each answer provided will have a score automatically attributed and the overall result will be returned based on those scores. Suggest using 'dropdown' selections for each questionnaire as supports attributing scores based on specific input. Questions that are not using dropdown selection will not contribute to overall result.
- Supplementary data For capturing custom data points. Does not have scoring or submission.

Binding.Expression: ARRAY( HASH( "text", "Feedback/Survey - Unscored", "value", "Feedback/Survey" ), HASH( "text", "Assessment/Quiz - Scored", "value", "Assessment/Quiz" ), HASH( "text", "RFX Response", "value", "RFX Response" ), HASH( "text", "Supplementary Data", "value", "Supplementary Data" ) )
AND( [View] = "Summary", [Name] <> "Initial Assessment", [Name] <> "Value Risk Assessment", [Scoring Type] = "Supplementary Data" )

Label.Text: What kind of information is the supplementary data supporting
Instructions to the participant (will not appear if empty)

Information.Text:
- Allow user to review their responses. After submitting will show the users what the highest scoring answers were. Applicable for quiz type questionnaires.
- See which answers were incorrect. Applicable when questions are scored. Will show a tick or cross next to each response but won't reveal the correct answer.
- See the correct answer for any incorrect responses. Applicable when questions are scored. If multiple answers return a score then the answer with the highest score will be shown

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_INDEXOF([Review Options], "Allow user to review their responses") > 0
ARRAY_INDEXOF([Review Options], "See which answers were incorrect") > 0
ARRAY_INDEXOF([Review Options], "See the correct answer for any incorrect responses") > 0

Binding.Expression: ARRAY( "Allow user to review their responses", "See which answers were incorrect", "See the correct answer for any incorrect responses" )

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_INDEXOF([Re-submission Options], "Re-open the assessment and re-submit") > 0

Binding.Expression: ARRAY( "Re-open the assessment and re-submit", "Try the assessment again" )

Information.Text:
- Re-open the assessment and re-submit. Lets the user make changes to their responses and resubmit having having already submitted.
- Try the assessment again. Applicable when questions are scored. Will show a tick or cross next to each response but won't reveal the correct answer.

Binding.Expression: AND( [Scoring Type] <> "Supplementary Data", [View] = "Summary", [Name] <> "Initial Assessment", [Name] <> "Value Risk Assessment" )

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_INDEXOF([Notification Options], "Notify users or groups when questionnaire submitted") > 0
ARRAY_INDEXOF([Notification Options], "Send a receipt to the participant") > 0

Information.Text:
- Send a receipt to the participant. Send a receipt to the participant when questionnaire is submitted.
- Notify users or groups when questionnaire submitted. Send notification to user/group when a questionnaire is submitted.

Binding.Expression: AND( [View] = "Summary", [Scoring Type] <> "Supplementary Data", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Notification Options], "Notify users or groups when questionnaire submitted") > 0 )

Label.Text: Is this questionnaire is part of a course(s)?

Binding.Expression: AND( [Part of a Course] <> TRUE, [View] = "Summary", DB_LOOKUP("RecordID", "Questionnaire Course") > 0 )

Label.Text: Is this questionnaire is part of a course(s)?

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $concat := ARRAY_CONCAT( [Course RecordIDs], [Temp] );
RETURN ARRAY_DISTINCT(ARRAY_WHERE($concat, $(i, item) $item <> NULL()))

LET $concat := ARRAY_CONCAT( [Course RecordIDs], [Course RecordID] );
RETURN ARRAY_DISTINCT(ARRAY_WHERE($concat, $(i, item) $item <> NULL()))

LET $removed := ARRAY_WHERE( [Course RecordIDs], $(i, item) $item <> [Course RecordID] );
RETURN ARRAY_DISTINCT(ARRAY_WHERE($removed, $(i, item) $item <> NULL()))

Binding.Expression: AND( [Part of a Course] = TRUE, [View] = "Summary", DB_LOOKUP("RecordID", "Questionnaire Course") > 0 )

Information.Text: Adds a text input for every question to capture any comments related to the question
If you want a thread connecting related questions you can define a set of categories that will be selectable on the question record
If you want a thread connecting related questions you can define a set of categories that will be selectable on the question record

CheckBox.Text: Show category results to participant on completion

Information.Text: Will display a bar chart and table breakdown on scores against each category

Binding.Expression: AND( [Show All Question Data] <> TRUE, [View] = "Build", [Scoring Type] <> "Supplementary Data" )

Label.Text: Questions requiring a score should use 'dropdown' answers

TextCriterion.Text: CASE WHEN [Guidance Documents] = TRUE THEN 'Yes' ELSE '' END
CASE WHEN [Mandatory] = TRUE THEN 'Yes' ELSE '' END
CASE WHEN [Participant Document Upload] = TRUE THEN 'Yes' ELSE '' END
CASE WHEN [Document Upload Mandatory] = TRUE THEN 'Yes' ELSE '' END

Label.Text: A quick way to unmap all questions from this questionnaire. This cannot be undone.
Export the current list of questions - this can be modified and reimported.
Download a template that can be used to bulk create questions
Import the filled-in template or modified exported questions. Will create / update based on the presence of unique question id in import.

Questions that have been updated will be propagated to all existing questionnaires.
Questions that have been deleted, are NOT removed from existing questionnaires when resyncing. To remove deleted questions from questionnaire that must be done directly on each questionnaire.

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY( "EFormType", "RecordID" ), "Questionnaire", "[LineNumber] = 1 AND [Supplementary Data Type] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Supplementary Data Type]) )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Show All Question Data] <> TRUE, [View] = "Build", [Scoring Type] = "Supplementary Data" )

Label.Text:
Basic: Points are simply accumulated from all questions to a single overall score. This is a very traditional style for tests.
Dual axis: Points are accumulated into two separate totals. Each question needs to be associated with a single axis. Since the results are on 2-axis an output is that the score can be represented on chart.
Choose a name for each axis. The max score is calculated based on the questions associated with each axis.

CheckBox.Text: Return a specific result based on participants score?

Binding.Expression: AND( [View] = "Build", [Scoring Axis] = "Single Axis", [Scored] = TRUE, [Specific Result] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: When the assessment is submitted all scores are added together and the result is returned based on where the score falls into the list below.

CheckBox.Text: Return a specific result based on participants score?

Binding.Expression: AND( [View] = "Build", [Scoring Axis] = "Single Axis", [Scored] = TRUE, [Specific Result] = TRUE )

Label.Text: When an assessment is submitted the result is returned based on where the participant scores falls into the list below.
Depending on your case this might not be applicable
Axis 1 is used as the x-axis, Axis 2 is y-axis. Dot will move from bottom left to top right of chart as score approaches maximum.

Binding.Expression: "Axis 1 (" & [Axis Name]#1 & ") is represented on the x-axis, Axis 2 (" & [Axis Name]#2 & ") is represented on the y-axis. Dot will move from bottom left to top right of chart as scores approach max."

AND( [View] = "Build", [Show Four Quadrant Chart] = TRUE, [Scored] = TRUE
)

Label.Text: Preview - enter scores to see how the chart will output

Binding.Expression:
LET $style := "background: #c6d7e2;" & "width: 677px;" & "border: 1px solid black;" & "text-align: center;" & "font-size: 10pt;" & "margin-left: 20px;"; RETURN "
" & HTMLENCODE([Axis Name]) & "
"

LET $style := "transform-origin: 0 0;" & "transform: rotate(90deg);" & "background: #c6d7e2;" & "width: 319px;" & "border: 1px solid black;" & "text-align: center;" & "font-size: 10pt;" & "margin-left: 1px;"; RETURN "
" & HTMLENCODE([Axis Name]) & "
"
AND( [View] = "Build", [Show Chart Preview] = TRUE, [Show Four Quadrant Chart] = TRUE )

TextCriterion.Text: STEP TO [sys.Users] ON [To].[Username] = [Assessment Started by] GET [DisplayName]

CheckBox.Text: Is the assessor assessing another individual

Information.Text: Is this a questionnaire where an assessor is assessing another individual - this will require having an assessor field and an assessee field.

CheckBox.Text: Enforce a maximum number of attempts per user within a period

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUPALL( "Description", "Standard Questionnaire", "[Name] IS NOT EMPTY AND [LineNumber] = 1" )
DB_LOOKUPALL( "EFormType", "Standard Questionnaire", "[Name] IS NOT EMPTY AND [LineNumber] = 1" )
DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Standard Questionnaire", "[Name] IS NOT EMPTY AND [LineNumber] = 1" )

Button.Text: Resync settings with all existing records

Label.Text: Are you sure you want to resync settings with all existing records? WARNING: This will overwrite the settings on all existing questionnaires

Button.Text: Resync settings with all existing records

DisplayMessage.MessageTemplate: Syncing with existing assessment please wait a moment

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY("EFormType", "RecordID"), "Questionnaire", "[LineNumber] = 1 AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) )

Binding.Expression: AND( [View] = "Advanced Settings", [Resync Questionnaires Confirmation Visible] = TRUE )

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Trigger - Clear Detected Email Data (before getting the recipients again)

Block.HeadingText: Select people to participate in assessment

Label.Text: Paste email addresses - supports line break, comma, and semi-colon delimiting

Detected Email Addresses to New Accounts

Binding.Expression: AND( [Invite - Email List] = TRUE, [View] = "Invite", [Detected Email Addresses] = NULL )

Number of Detected Email Addresses to New Accounts

ARRAY_JOIN([Detected Email Addresses to New Accounts], ", ")
[Detected Email Addresses to New Accounts] <> NULL()

Label.Text: Selecting many will display averages across all selected.

Binding.Expression: AND( [View] = "Results", [Scored] = TRUE, [Use Question Categories] = TRUE, [Show Full Size Category Report] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: Selecting many will display averages across all selected.

Binding.Expression: AND( [View] = "Results", [Scored] = TRUE, [Use Question Categories] = TRUE, [Show Full Size Category Report] = TRUE )

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Evaluator", ROLE(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER()), "Questionnaire RecordIDs Custom Filter", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT(ARRAY_FIRST([Temp])) )

ChangeFieldValues.RecordIDFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Standard Question", "[LineNumber] = 1 AND [Question Category UUID] <> NULL AND [Question Category UUID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Question Category UUID]) & " AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = "& DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) )
ChangeFieldValues.Description: Update Category name on linked questions

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY("EFormType", "RecordID"), "Standard Question", HASH( "Question Category UUID", [Question Category UUID]#[LineNumber], "Linked Entity EFormType", [EFormType], "Linked Entity RecordID", [RecordID], "LineNumber", 1 ) )

FormulaCriterion.Formula: OR( [Loaded].[Question Category UUID] <> [Question Category UUID], [Loaded].[Question Category] <> [Question Category] )

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE
WHEN [Question Type] = 'Scored' THEN 'Question'
WHEN [Question Type] = 'Unscored' THEN 'Question'
WHEN [Question Type] = 'Category' THEN 'Criteria'
ELSE [Question Type]
END

Data.SortOrder: [Group Sort ID] ASC, [Question Sort ID] ASC

FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.FieldValuesFormula: HASH( "Standard Questionnaire RecordID", [RecordID], "Questionnaire", [Name], "Question Category", [Question Category]#(ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Question Category UUID], [Category Filter])), "Question Category UUID", [Category Filter], "Type", "Evaluation Criteria", "Question Type", "Category", "Question Sort ID", 0, "Group Sort ID", ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "MAX([Group Sort ID])", "Standard Question", "[LineNumber] = 1" & " AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) & " AND [Question Category UUID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Category Filter]) ))) + 1 )

HASH( "Standard Questionnaire RecordID", [RecordID], "Questionnaire", [Name], "Question Category", [Question Category]#(ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Question Category UUID], [Category Filter])), "Question Category UUID", [Category Filter], "Type", "Evaluation Criteria", "Question Type", "Info", "Question Sort ID", ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "MAX([Question Sort ID])", "Standard Question", "[LineNumber] = 1" & " AND [Standard Questionnaire RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) & " AND [Question Category UUID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Category Filter]) & " AND [Question Group] IS NULL" ))) + 1 )

Label.Text: What would you like to load

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Import - Criteria Data], $(i, item) NULL )

Binding.Expression: LET $set := EACH [Import - Criteria Selected]; RETURN ARRAY_INDEXOF($set, TRUE) = NULL

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Criteria Name], $(i, item) IF($item <> NULL, [Criteria UUID]#$i) )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Import - Criteria Data], $(i, item) NULL )

Binding.Expression: LET $set := EACH [Import - Criteria Set Selected]; RETURN ARRAY_INDEXOF($set, TRUE) = NULL

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Import - Criteria Set Data], $(i, item) IF($i = [LineNumber], TRUE) )

RecordRef.RecordID: LET $id := HASH_GET([Import - Criteria Set Data], "RecordID"); RETURN $id

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Import - Criteria Set Data], $(i, item) IF($i = [LineNumber], TRUE) )

Event.Name: Clear Detected Email Data
Event.Description: when switching from Email List to Specific Users/Groups/Dept

FieldEntry.ColumnName: Number of Detected Email Addresses to Existing Accounts
Number of Detected Email Addresses to New Accounts
Detected Email Addresses to Existing Accounts
Detected Email Addresses to New Accounts

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Invite - Email Address], $(i, item) [Invite - Username]#$i <> NULL )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Invite - Email Address], $(i, item) IF( [Invite - Username]#$i <> NULL, EBMS_GET_ROLE_DISPLAYNAME([Invite - Username]#$i), IFERROR(LEFT($item, FIND("@", $item) - 1), $item) ) )
ARRAY_WHERE(ARRAY_CONCAT([Detected Email Addresses], ARRAY_SELECT([Invite Recipients - Usernames], $(i, item) EBMS_GET_ROLE_EMAIL_ADDRESSES($item, TRUE))), $(j, jitem) $jitem <> NULL())
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Invite - Email Address], $(i, item) [Invite - Username]#$i <> NULL )
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Invite - Email Address], $(i, item) IF( [Invite - Username]#$i <> NULL, EBMS_GET_ROLE_DISPLAYNAME([Invite - Username]#$i), IFERROR(LEFT($item, FIND("@", $item) - 1), $item) ) )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Refresh record to get Question Category working

DisplayMessage.MessageTemplate: This category ({HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Temp], "Criteria Data"), "Criteria Name")}) has already been added to this questionnaire.

FormulaCriterion.Formula: //run if this category hasn't already been added DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Standard Question", HASH( "Question GUID", HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Temp], "Criteria Data"),"Criteria UUID"), "Standard Questionnaire RecordID", RecordID, "Linked Entity EFormType", EFormType, "Linked Entity RecordID", RecordID ) ) <> NULL

//run if this category hasn't already been added DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Standard Question", HASH( "Question GUID", HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Temp], "Criteria Data"),"Criteria UUID"), "Standard Questionnaire RecordID", RecordID, "Linked Entity EFormType", EFormType, "Linked Entity RecordID", RecordID ) ) = NULL

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula: ARRAY_SELECT( [Temp - Criteria Set Import], $(i, item) NULL )

CreateGuestUser.UserNameFormula: LET $target := ARRAY_INDEX($eventargs, 1); RETURN EBMS_CLEAN_USERNAME(IFERROR(LEFT($target, FIND("@", $target, "") - 1), ARRAY_INDEX($eventargs, 1)))

FormulaCriterion.Formula: ARRAY_INDEXOF([Detected Email Addresses to New Accounts], ARRAY_INDEX($eventargs, 1)) > 0

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Manager Assessment] = TRUE, NULL, COALESCE([Generated Username], ARRAY_INDEX($eventargs, 1)) )

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: IF( [Generated Username] <> NULL(), HASH( "Username", [Generated Username], "Password", [Generated Password], "Email Address", ARRAY_INDEX($eventargs, 1), "Name", ARRAY_INDEX($eventargs, 2) ) )
TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Send Invite Email (if under 5 emails to be sent)

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: IF( [Generated Username] <> NULL(), HASH( "Username", [Generated Username], "Password", [Generated Password], "Email Address", ARRAY_INDEX($eventargs, 1), "Name", ARRAY_INDEX($eventargs, 2) ) )
TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Send Invite Email - Delayed (if 5 or more emails to be sent)
